channel.title: Change stats of items?
channel.description: how do i change the stats of an item? could some1 post a link 2 a tut or explain real quick. thx

item.title: Change stats of items?
item.dc:creator: @pwned_my_mom pwned my mom
item.description:
@pwned_my_mom wrote:

Open up item.cfg and search with CTRL + F for the item u want to change it shoulda look like this

item = 667 Bandos Godsword Bandos's Legendary Blade 200 200 2147000000 --> 0 132 80 0 0 [b]--> 0 0 0 0 0[/b] [i]132 0[/i]

Attack bonuses

The 0 = Stab
The 132 = Slash
The 80 = Crush
The 0 = mage
The 0 = range

Defence bonuses – (between the [b] and the [/b])

The 0 = Stab
The 0 = Slash
The 0 = Crush
The 0 = mage
The 0 = range

Last bonuses – (between the [i] and the [/i]

The 132 = strength
The 0 = prayer

Simply change the numbers to make it stronger.

Read full topic
